getOrCreateCalEvent
This function is used to create a calendar event, returning an instance of the "iCalendar event" type [SYS_ICALENDAR_EVENT].
Syntax
getOrCreateCalEvent
(object, template)
Setting
Purpose
object
Object by which the algorithm is run.
In case when the notification template includes:
algorithms, which will be run within the specified object.
attributes, their values will be taken from the specified object.
When the function is called, a dummy variable
"object"
is set, which should be replaced with the desired value.
template
Notification template
that generates the message to the user.
When the function is called, a dummy variable
"temlate"
is set, which should be replaced with the necessary value using the
dict
function.
It is mandatory to use a template implemented using
"Calendar notification" [SYS_CALENDAR_NOTIFY]
type
(or child type).
Note
The function is called from the
"Users and groups" tab
of the algorithm editor toolbar.
A code lock with placeholder variables will be added to the algorithm, which should be replaced with the required parameters.
When using this function to send an email message, it is important to ensure that the base type of algorithms used in the notification template matches the object type from which the email is sent.
Algorithms with a base type that does not match the object type used to send the email will be ignored by the System.
